summary: Zeelo is a bus sharing company functioning as a SaaS platform. My main focus while working here was on improving and adding features to the internal tools, which are used on a daily basis by operators. The platform is built with React and uses an inhouse UI library created with Styled-Components powered by Storybook.

LeoVegas is an online casino provider. My daily job includes developing new features, especially to enhance the game experience for players. I work with React.js, Node.js and GraphQL on a daily basis. Other responsibilities include writing tests for the features we develop, maintain and bug-fix any feature previously released, and close collaboration between designers and BackEnd developers. In my nearly 3 years at LeoVegas, I have gone from junior to senior within the company. I functioned as interim team-lead for 4 months, where I guided the project from start to finish while coding and managing team members and stakeholders.
